sqlMap.select: SELECT service_point_type_id, service_point_type_code, point_amount, max(standard_level) as standard_level, remarks, created_date, created_user, last_update_date, last_update_user FROM service_point_type_mst WHERE service_point_type_code = #servicePointTypeCode# AND standard_level <= #standardLevel#

SELECT service_point_type_id, service_point_type_code, point_amount, max(standard_level) as standard_level, remarks, created_date, created_user, last_update_date, last_update_user FROM service_point_type_mst WHERE service_point_type_code = #servicePointTypeCode# AND standard_level <= ( SELECT sum(ifnull(point_amount_act, 0)) as point_amount_act FROM mem_settlement_hist WHERE mem_num = #memNum# AND title_id = #titleId# AND last_update_date < DATE_SUB(now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
